kelimutu.title: Kelimutu Crater Lakes
kelimutu.description: A clear view of the famous tri-colored crater lakes of Mount Kelimutu.

hawkEagle.title: Flores Hawk Eagle (Nisaetus floris)
hawkEagle.description: A critically endangered raptor found only in the forests of Flores, soaring with powerful wings as it guards the island’s peaks with sharp eyes and commanding grace.

betweenLakes.title: Between the Lakes
betweenLakes.description: A view of the rocky terrain located between Kelimutu’s crater rims.

independenceDay.title: Independence Day Ceremony
independenceDay.description: A special ceremony held every 17 August to celebrate Indonesia’s Independence Day at Mount Kelimutu.

kelimutuFar.title: Kelimutu from Afar
kelimutuFar.description: A distant view of the Kelimutu crater landscape, showing its dramatic terrain.

nightSky.title: Kelimutu Night Sky
nightSky.description: A breathtaking Milky Way shot captured from Kelimutu, known for its clear skies with minimal light pollution.

patika.title: Pati Ka
patika.description: Pati Ka Du'a Bapu Ata Mata, an annual cultural ceremony held every 14th of August at Mount Kelimutu.

sunrise.title: Kelimutu Sunrise
sunrise.description: A sunrise view from Kelimutu, one of the most popular moments for visitors.

garugiwa.title: Garugiwa (Pachycephala nudigula)
garugiwa.description: An iconic Flores species whose 12-note call fills Kelimutu’s dawn with an almost mystical chorus, greeting visitors as light rises over the crater lakes.
